attributes.action: Provide HM Forces with the correct equipment in ALL theatre's of conflict.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is about time everyone stood behind our forces and that includes the Government! our Troops dont choose where to go, they do the job above and beyond the call of duty, lets make sure they are looked after

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
